sentences.sContent: It was decided by a unanimous vote that the school should close.
sentences.sCn: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

synos.tran: 全体一致的；意见一致的；无异议的

remMethod.val: un(=uni一个)+anim(生命， 精神)+ous → 全体一致的

trans.tranCn: 意见一致的, 无异议的
trans.tranOther: a unanimous decision, vote, agreement etc is one in which all the people involved agree
